comments.title: What our
comments.description: In the company of Funding Stax we value every review. Our clients are our greatest honor! We strive to provide high level of service and tools for successful trading.

q-1.question: What is prop trading?
q-1.answer: Prop trading is a form of trading in which traders use a company's capital to make trades in the financial markets.

q-2.question: How does your prop company work?
q-2.answer: We provide funding to successful traders after they pass a special challenge.

q-3.question: What is a challenge?
q-3.answer: This is a test period, during which the trader demonstrates his skills and compliance with the rules of risk management on a demo account.

q-4.question: What happens after successfully completing the challenge?
q-4.answer: After successfully completing the Challenge, the trader gets access to a real account with our capital.

q-5.question: How much funding is provided?
q-5.answer: Funding Stax provides funding from $5,000 to $200,000.

q-6.question: How are profits distributed?
q-6.answer: Profit is distributed from the selected chelendage in proportions 85/15 and 90/10. Most of the profit is taken by the trader.

q-7.question: What markets are available for trading?

q-8.question: What trading platforms do you use?
q-8.answer: We use the modern and technologically advanced Trade Locker platform, which is available on desktop and mobile versions.

q-9.question: How is the trade monitored?
q-9.answer: We constantly monitor traders' activities to ensure compliance with risk management rules and terms of cooperation.

q-10.question: What happens in the event of a rule violation?
q-10.answer: If you violate the rules, the system will automatically close your Trade Locker account.

q-11.question: What are the requirements for traders?
q-11.answer: Funding Stax is in search of stable and confident traders who know how to work properly with RM and MM.

q-12.question: How do I apply to participate?
q-12.answer: Sign up for our dashboard and choose the shuttle challenge that's right for you.

q-13.question: Is there a fee to participate in the challenge?
q-13.answer: All the Challenges are paid, after successful completion of the Challenges we refund you the cost of participation, but on the second payment.

q-14.question: How are payments to traders made?
q-14.answer: Payouts are made on any convenient day for you. The payment should be more than 1% of the total trading balance. Payment terms up to 48 hours.

q-15.question: Do you have a customer service department?

q-16.question: Where can I learn more about your company?
q-16.answer: We'll point out the references later.
